name: Ayumi's Little Adventure
description:
Use a controller or WASD + N buttons to control.

Simple side-scrolling shooter with significantly less bullets than a bullet-hell shooter. Like really, the difference is huge.

First level is done. Another two will follow. The music will change, some SFX and perhaps some other things.
